import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./LineasDeAyuda.scss"; const LineasDeAyuda = () => { const [isActive, setIsActive] = useState(false); const accordionData = { title: '¿Tienes dudas?', content: <>
Enviar correo
+57 (1) 3078079
01 - 8000 - 910122
Preguntas frecuentes
}; const { title, content } = accordionData; return (
setIsActive(!isActive)} >
{title}
{ isActive ? : }
{isActive &&
{content}
}
); }; export default LineasDeAyuda;
